### BMI augmenation:

```{r}
BMI_data <- metric_data |>
  drop_na(c(hdl,weight,height)) |>
  tibble(BMI = weight/((height/100)**2)) |>
  mutate(BMI_class = case_when(
    BMI < 16.5 ~ "Severely underweight",
    16.5 <= BMI & BMI < 18.5 ~ "Underweight",
    18.5 <= BMI & BMI < 24.9 ~ "Normal weight",
    24.9 <= BMI & BMI < 30 ~ "Overweight",
    BMI >= 30 & BMI < 35 ~ "Obesity class I",
    BMI >= 35 & BMI < 40 ~ "Obesity class II",
    BMI >= 40 ~ "Obesity class III")) |>
  mutate(BMI_class = factor(BMI_class,
                            levels = c("Severely underweight","Underweight",
                                       "Normal weight", "Overweight",
                                       "Obesity", "Obesity class I",
                                       "Obesity class II", "Obesity class III")))
BMI_data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = hdl, y = BMI_class)) +
    geom_boxplot()
```

### Age group Augmentation:

```{r}
meta_data |>
  drop_na(Gender) |>
  select(Age,Gender) |>
  mutate(Age_group =  cut(Age, breaks = c(20,30,40,50,60,70,80))) |>
  ggplot(aes(Age_group, fill = Gender, alpha = 0.3)) +
  geom_histogram(stat = "count", position = "dodge")
```
